extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (A grade of B- in FILM 110) or (a GPA of 2.60 in FILM 104 and FILM 106) or (a GPA of 2.60 in BISC100 and FILM104) and (reg. in a FILM Plan, STSC or the Computer-Film (COFI) Specialization Plan).

basic.description: A series of interactive presentations and lectures instructing students in research methods, argumentative writing, and the design of effective audio-visual presentations.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Research, Writing, and Presentation Methods
